Text:
I think it's a hilarious coincidence that I just decided to start reading this a few days ago,
Then I leave the book somewhere I won't return for a few weeks (accidentally),
I look here to see if it's available...and then I see it uploaded only Yesterday!

Thanks! You saved me from weeks with out this, so far, wonderful story!
@keepeas: I'm glad it helped :D Let's hope you have an eReader
